summary: MkDocs AI Hooks project enhances technical documentation and blogs with AI-driven summary generation and intelligent reading statistics using MkDocs hooks. Key features include AI-generated summaries, multi-language support, smart content cleaning, efficient caching, and flexible configuration. It also offers intelligent reading statistics with precise Chinese character counting, code detection, and estimated reading time. The system supports automatic language recognition, content type detection, cache optimization, error handling, and customizable API services. Installation involves downloading Python files and configuring directories. The project aims to support multiple AI services, improve response parsing, and introduce advanced features like custom API services and cache settings.
